title: Motorola is reportedly working on another affordable Stylus-equipped phone
content:
If you’re looking for a smartphone with stylus support, the Galaxy S22 Ultra is, without a doubt, the best option on the market. But of course, not everyone is ready to spend $1,200 on a smartphone. This is where Motorola’s Moto G Stylus lineup comes into the picture, which not only packs a built-in stylus

The post Motorola is reportedly working on another affordable Stylus-equipped phone appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Evan Blass has shared high-quality renders of the Moto G Stylus 5G (2022), complete with full specifications.
